text: Egha a Jeroboamɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ikiavɨra Itir God, Israelian God, kamaghɨn nɨ mɨgei, ‘Nɨ gan! Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ atrivir ingangarimɨn Solomon agɨvasa nɨghnigha gɨfa. Kɨ nɨ damightɨ nɨ Israelian anabar 10pla gativagh men ganam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ korotiar akuar 10pla ua bagh dar suikigh.
